io.confluent.ksql.schema.ksql

Class SqlBooleans

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.schema.ksql.SqlBooleans

  • public final class SqlBooleans
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpers for working with Sql BOOLEAN.

    • Method Summary

      static boolean parseBoolean(java.lang.String value)

    • Method Detail

      • parseBoolean

        public static boolean parseBoolean(java.lang.String value)
        Parse a SQL boolean from a string, treating any non true value as false.

        The function returns true if the string is (case-insensitive) either 'yes' or 'true' or a substring of either, otherwise false.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to parse
        Returns:
        the boolean parsed from the string.

      • parseBooleanExact

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.Boolean> parseBooleanExact(java.lang.String value)
        Parse a SQL boolean from a string, throwing if the string does ot contain a valid boolean.

        The function returns true if the string is (case-insensitive) either 'yes' or 'true' or a substring of either, false if the string is (case-insensitive) either 'no' or 'false' or a substring of either, otherwise empty.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to parse
        Returns:
        the boolean parsed from the string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the string does not contain a boolean value.
